description: This file defines an interface (IRtspClient) for an RTSP client within the WPEFramework, specifying methods for configuration, playback control, and setting/getting parameters.

classes.name: IRtspClient
classes.description: Interface for RTSP client with methods for configuration, control, and parameter access.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configures the RTSP client with the given service shell.

methods.name: Setup
methods.description: Prepares the RTSP stream with the specified asset ID and position.

methods.name: Play
methods.description: Starts playback with a specified scale and position.

methods.name: Teardown
methods.description: Stops the RTSP stream and cleans up resources.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets a parameter by name and value.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a parameter by name.

ctags.name: IRtspClient
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IRtspClient : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
